name: TECH DEMO - Another Story About Us
name_original: TECH DEMO - Another Story About Us
description:
Hello!

Today I want to present a tech demo of my next project Another Story About Us! A sequel .. or a prequel to my other game A Story About You & Me. I really loved the world of the first game,  and I wanted to expand on it, bringing more horror and interaction with it.

Follow new protagonist - Oswald, as he's trying to get to an office of his former colleague.

In this demo you'll see the game mechanics I was working on lately. I want to know what people think, so leave all your thoughts! 

Note: All the music was taken from Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
